title: Replays - Choppy Video, No Audio? Windows Media Player
body: I used the recorder from the updated client's replay feature and I use Windows Media Player by default. However, when I try using that app/program to watch my recordings, the picture is more pixellated & the frames are lower (than from watching the replay in the client itself) and there is no audio. How exactly am I supposed to be watching my recordings? What should I do to get the best viewing experience? I'm on Windows 10.

replies.body:
https://youtu.be/9hm6ILK-ubs

I think WebM files work better with a browser.

Replays are still in testing, so you'll want to report this to the client devs.  Post this over at the [client discussion b](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)oards and share your feedback.  Thanks for helping with testing!
